text.*:
World map of FIFA's six intercontinental governing bodies.

The following article gives a list of Women's association football confederations, sub-confederations and associations around the world.

For international competitions see the article International competitions in women's football.

By continent[edit]

Continent Governing body Abbr. No. FIFA members Main international competition(s)
Club competition(s) National competition(s)
Africa      Confederation of African Football CAF 56 54 Africa Women Cup of Nations
Asia      Asian Football Confederation AFC 47 46 AFC Women's Asian Cup
Europe      Union of European Football Associations UEFA 55 All UEFA Women's Champions League UEFA Women's Championship
North, Central
America and
the Caribbean 		     Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football CONCACAF 41 35 Gold Cup
South America      Confederación Sudamericana de Fútbol CONMEBOL 10 All Copa Libertadores Femenina Copa América Femenina
Oceania      Oceania Football Confederation OFC 14 11 OFC Women's Nations Cup
